panels.title: Terminal Routing Instruction Rate

panels.description:
Total number of times interaction was placed back in queue by reason. List of reasons:
- StrategyRequest - Strategy requested placing interaction back into queue explicitly. Set by ORS.
- Implicit - Strategy did nothing and ORS places interaction back cause there are no instructions for it. Set by ORS.
- Error - ORS places interaction back into queue due to some error regardless of the error source be it strategy itself or any other reason. Set by ORS.
- InternalError - IXN Node failed to send interaction to ORS and places it back into queue.
- Unknown - Reason was not specified.
panels.title: Interactions Placed Back Total

panels.title: Total Non-Terminal Routing Instructions

panels.description: Number of the strategies for which interactions are being pulled currently.

panels.description: Total number of configuration fetching errors.
panels.title: Total Configuration Fetch Errors

panels.description: The status of pulling interactions for strategy. Pulling is cycling process and it may get stuck for some causes, thus routing for corresponding strategies fails.

targets.expr:
# As increase and rate are extrapolated to cover the full time range, "AND ixnnode_pull_request_total" is added not to have values within 5m after a service has been stopped.
floor(
  (sum by (tenant)((increase(ixnnode_pull_request_total[5m]) AND ixnnode_pull_request_total) > bool 0) 
    / count by (tenant)(ixnnode_pull_request_total)
    - 0.001
  ) / 0.998
)
OR min by (tenant)(((up{servicename="ixn", container="ixn-node"} > 0) > bool 1) - 1)

panels.title: Pulling Interactions for Startegies

panels.description:
The size of the queue of  routing instructions waiting for completion processing is under limit.
When the queue size reaches the limit defined in IXN Node, reading of  routing instructions stops.

targets.expr:
min by (tenant)(
  (ixnnode_instructions_processing_queue_concurrency_limit - 
    sum without(type)(ixnnode_instructions_processing_queue_size))
  +
  increase(ixnnode_all_instructions_received_total[1m])

) > bool 0
OR min by (tenant)((up{servicename="ixn", container="ixn-node"} > 0) > bool 1)

panels.title: Processing of Instructions Received from ORS

panels.description:
Number of RequestPull successfully completed by InteractionServer.
A metric increasing at a constant rate means a routing cycle for a specific strategy is working fine.
Possible issues:
 - IxN client can't send a request or the request timeout has expired - routing cycle stops until reconnect to IxN Server
 - IxN server returns something wrong - routing cycle waits 10 secs and continues
 - sending an interaction to ORS failed - routing cycle got stuck (RqClient issue) or waits 10 secs after an exception and continuous
panels.title: Pull Requests Total

panels.description:
Number of RequestPull successfully completed by InteractionServer.
A metric increasing at a constant rate means a routing cycle for a specific strategy is working fine.
Possible issues:
 - IxN client can't send a request or the request timeout has expired - routing cycle stops until reconnect to IxN Server
 - IxN server returns something wrong - routing cycle waits 10 secs and continues
 - sending an interaction to ORS failed - routing cycle got stuck (RqClient issue) or waits 10 secs after an exception and continuous
panels.title: Pull Requests Rate
